devdoc.details: Uses Coinbase's SpendPermissionManager for automated deposits

createSIPPlan(uint256,uint256,uint8,uint.details: This is called by the frontend when user confirms their plan

params.planId: The database plan ID for reference

depositDirect(uint256).details: Alternative method for direct deposits without spend permissions

executeDeposit(address,uint256,(address,.details: Called by the server wallet (spender) using the stored spend permission

params.amount: Amount to deposit in this execution
params.signature: The user's signature for the spend permission
params.user: The user whose SIP is being executed

devdoc.title: LumoContract

createSIPPlan(uint256,uint256,uint8,uint.notice: Create a new SIP plan for a user

depositDirect(uint256).notice: Execute a deposit with direct ETH transfer (for users who send ETH directly)

executeDeposit(address,uint256,(address,.notice: Execute a deposit for a user's SIP plan using spend permission

getUserPlanIds(address).notice: Get all plan IDs for a user

userdoc.notice: Main contract for Lumo SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) DeFi automation
